assignments.description: Uncheck Send Contract and Reset Contract Stage
assignments.name: Revert
assignments.label: Revert

rules.name: Send_Preenrolment_Form
rules.conditionLogic: 1 AND (2 OR 3) AND 4 AND 5 AND 6 AND 7
rules.label: Send Preenrolment Form

rules.name: Ready_for_Contract_Reenrolment
rules.conditionLogic: 1 AND (2 OR 3) AND 4 AND 5 AND 6 AND 7 AND 8 AND 9
rules.label: Ready for Contract - Reenrolment

rules.name: Apply_Costs_is_TRUE
rules.conditionLogic: 1 AND (2 OR 3) AND 4 AND 5 AND 6 AND 7
rules.label: Apply Costs is TRUE

rules.name: Apply_Discounts_is_TRUE
rules.conditionLogic: 1 AND 2 AND (3 OR 4) AND (5 OR 6 OR 8) AND 7
rules.label: Apply Discounts is TRUE

rules.name: Approved
rules.conditionLogic: (1 OR 2 OR 11) AND (3 OR 4) AND 5 AND 6 AND 7 AND 8 AND ( 9 OR 10)
rules.label: Approved

rules.name: Send_Back_After_Costs_and_Discounts
rules.label: Send Back After Costs and Discounts

decisions.description: Send out the Pre-enrolment form emails with the links
decisions.name: Send_Pre_Enrolment_form_out
decisions.label: Send Pre-Enrolment form out

Flow.description: Contract workflow, field updates, communications. Adding in the Pre-Enrolment section
Flow.label: Contract Flow

textTemplates.name: Deposit_Send_Flow_Template
